mapper.select: SELECT ET.EXCTG_AREA as target_area, SUM(EXCH_TOTAL_CALORIES * ET.EXCTG_WEIGHT) as total_calories FROM FIREMEN.EXERCISE_HISTORY EH JOIN FIREMEN.EXERCISE_TARGET ET on EH.EXC_SEQ = ET.EXC_SEQ WHERE EH.MBR_SEQ = #{mbrSeq} AND EXCH_START_TIME >= #{startDate} AND EXCH_START_TIME < #{endDate} GROUP BY ET.EXCTG_AREA
